changeSet.author: test
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE hieubui.time ( time_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, month INTEGER, quarter INTEGER, year INTEGER, create_at DATE, modified_at DATE )
CREATE TABLE hieubui.location ( location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, CITY VARCHAR, COUNTRY VARCHAR, CREATE_AT TIMESTAMP, MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE hieubui.product ( product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, CLASS VARCHAR, CREATE_AT TIMESTAMP, INVENTORY VARCHAR, ITEM INTEGER, MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE hieubui.sale ( sale_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, location_id UUID, product_id UUID, time_id UUID, CREATE_AT TIMESTAMP, DOLLARS VARCHAR, MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP )
